Meet our team

Darrow Lykos

Co-owner

I’m originally from Indiana. I was raised on a farm and became an Eagle Scout in 2008. I graduated from Purdue University in 2012 with a degree in Design, and I’ve been working in the paint industry ever since.

Virginia Augustus

Co-owner

I grew up in the suburbs of Chicago. I was a competitive swimmer for 12 years and played water polo in college. I graduated from the University of Illinois in 2012.

Victra Julii

Project Estimator

I'm from the south side of Chicago. I graduated from the University of Illinois in 2013. I've been working in the paint industry ever since. I’m a huge fan of the outdoors and I love to travel.
